message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $13,000. I believe this offer represents a fair deal considering its value to both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet halfway at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $11,000? I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to be careful with my finances.
